<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	(25.7)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:02.08%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #CCEEFF;HEIGHT:12.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	%
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</EFX_INCOME_STATEMENT>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Income is earned by selling merchandise at price levels that produce revenues in excess of cost of merchandise sold and operating and administrative expenses.&nbsp;&nbsp;Although the Company may experience short term fluctuations in its earnings due to unforeseen short-term operating cost increases, it historically has been able to increase revenues and maintain stable earnings from year to year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Net Sales
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company's revenues are earned and cash is generated as merchandise is sold to customers at the point of sale.&nbsp;&nbsp;Discounts provided to customers by the Company at the point of sale are recognized as a reduction in sales as products are sold or over the life of a promotional program if redeemable in the future.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Discounts provided by vendors, usually in the form of paper coupons, are not recognized as a reduction in sales provided the coupons are
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	redeemable at any retailer that accepts coupons.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Total store sales increased 3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	% in 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	compared to 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. Excluding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	fuel sales, total store sales incre
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in 2015 compared to 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Total
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	store sales in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	creased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	3.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	% in 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	compared to 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Excluding
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	fuel sales, total store sales
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	creased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	% in 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	compared to 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	When calculating the percentage change in comparable store sales, the Company defines a new store to be comparable when it has been in operation for five full quarters.&nbsp;&nbsp;Relocated stores and stores with expanded square footage are included in comparable store sales since these units are located in existing markets and are open during construction.&nbsp;&nbsp;Planned store dispositions are excluded from the calculation.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company only includes retail food stores in the calculation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:15PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL UNICODE MS;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company attributes the increase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	d sales
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to its continued investments in lower pricing and disciplined sales building programs.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	This includes t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	argeted promotional activity in key regional markets
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Everyday Lower Prices (EDLP) and Lowest Price Guarantee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	promotional
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	program
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; The EDLP program lowered prices on more than 1,000 regularly purchased items.&nbsp; The Lowest Price Guarantee program offers discounts on four items every week that the Company guarantees to be the lowest compared to local competitors.&nbsp; Compared to 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4, the Company experienced
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	% &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	de

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company&#x2019;s results also benefited from increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	store level and supply chain
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	efficiencies and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	improved
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	customer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	experience
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition, the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Preferred Club Shopper program continues to target
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	customer members
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	with personalized offers and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	digital coupons
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to help them save money.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	As part of this loyalty marketing program, the Company continues
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to offer its "Gas Rewards" program in most markets.&nbsp;&nbsp;The "Gas Rewards" program allows Weis Preferred Shoppers club card members to earn gas discounts resulting from their in-store purchases.&nbsp;&nbsp;Customers can redeem these gas discounts at any of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	thirty-one
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis Gas-n-Go locations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, as well as participating third-party gas retail locations such as Sheetz convenience stores, which are located in most of the Company&#x2019;s markets.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL UNICODE MS;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL UNICODE MS;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Comparable health and beauty care sa
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	les increased 5.0% in 2015 compared to 2014.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The increase for these items was primarily driven by improved in-stock positions at store level due to the introduction of a computer generated ordering system.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	New
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	products
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	coupled with electronic marketing programs and the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	successful
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	execution of category business plans
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	also aided
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	sales.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL UNICODE MS;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Comparable meat sales increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4.3%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	compared to 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and increased 3.8% in 2014 compared to 2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In addition to increased costs of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	commodities for the first half of the year which led to retail inflation i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	n 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the Company continued to build the meat department&#x2019;s base business through aggressive ads, the introduction of new programs, expanded variety and display space for All Natural and Organic products
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company also maintained a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	continued focus on superior customer service and fresh cut meat at store level through its &#x201C;Great
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Meals Start Here&#x201D; program
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, which was introduced in January 2014.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Comparable meat sales increased 3.8% in 2014 compared to 2013.&nbsp;&nbsp;The &#x201C;Great Meals Start Here&#x201D; program
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	coupled with price inflation; more aggressive advertising; and a focus on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	improving store condition and resetting the stores to better serve our custom
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	er
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s&#x2019; needs contributed to the meat sales increase in 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL UNICODE MS;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL UNICODE MS;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Comparable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	produce
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	sales increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	% in 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	compared to 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The 2015 sales increase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	has been driven by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	an aggressive advertising and merchandising campaign; larger crops being harvested as compared to estimates, resulting in lower average retail prices
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	but
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	increased unit sales; and an increased variety in key categories of produce. In addition, sales growth
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in the produce department
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	can be attributed to store remodeling projects, associate training classes and improved execution at the store level.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	13

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage16"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT -0.75PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	WEIS MARKETS, INC.
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<A HREF="#WMK10K2015_10K_HTM_TABLE_OF_CONTENTS">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Item 7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Management's Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations: (continued)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:12.7PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:12.7PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Results of Operations (continued)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:12.7PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:12.7PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Net Sales (continued)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Comparable pharmacy sales increased 7.4% in 2015 compared to 2014.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The pharmacy
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	sales increase was driven by an increased number of filled prescriptions, partially due to an increased acceptance of preferred th
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ir
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	party insurance plans as well as expanded
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	pharmacy hours
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Comparable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	pharmacy
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	sales increased 8.5% in 2014 compared to 2013.&nbsp; Pharmacy sales experienced significant price inflation in 2014 but were negatively affected in 2013 due to the conversion of brand to generic drugs.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In additon to the price inflation, the sales increase was also attributed to an increased number of prescriptions being filled, partially due to the Company&#x2019;s in-store pet medication and medication synchronization programs.&nbsp;&nbsp;Also contributing to the increase, were expanded pharmacy hours at some stores and more individuals being eligible for healthcare benefits under the Affordable Care Act.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Comparable fuel sales decreased 25.4% in 2015 compared to 2014.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Fuel sales decreased as a result of the decline in retail fuel prices from 2014 to 2015.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	According to the U.S. Dep
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	artment of Energy, the 52-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	week average price of gasoline in the Central Atlantic States decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	27.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or $0.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	98
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	per gallon
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in 2015 compared to 2014.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Comparable fuel sales increased 0.4% in 2014 compared to 2013.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Management remains confident in its ability to generate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	sales growth in a highly competitive environment, but also understands some competitors have greater financial resources and could use these resources to take measures which could adversely affect the Company's competitive position.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Cost of Sales and Gross Profit
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Cost of sales consists of direct product costs (net of discounts and allowances), distribution center and transportation costs, as well as manufacturing facility operations.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Almost all of the increase in cost of sales in 2015 as compares to 2014 is due to the increased sales volume in 2015.&nbsp;&nbsp;Both direct product cost and distribution cost increase when sales volume increases.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	According to the latest U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics&#x2019; report, the annual Seasonally Adjusted Food-at-Home Consumer Price Index increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	% in 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	% in 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	0.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	% in 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Even though the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics&#x2019; index rates may be reflective of a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	trend, it will not necessarily be indicative of the Company&#x2019;s actual results
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Despite the fluctuation of retail and wholesale prices, the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	has achieved
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a gross profit rate of 27.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	% in 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, 27.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	% in 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and 27.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	% in 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	increase in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	gross profit rate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	was driven by a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	shift in sales mix from fuel to grocery sales which carry a higher profit margin.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The gross profit rate declined in 2014 as a result of the implementation of the Company&#x2019;s Three Ways to Save sales initiative, which consisted of the EDLP and Lowest Price Guarantee programs throughout the year, the &#x201C;Price Freeze&#x201D; program in the first quarter and the &#x201C;Get Grillin&#x201D; program in the second quarter.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company experienced
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a LIFO charge of $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	for 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, compared
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to a charge of $911,000 for 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and a charge of $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	692,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	for 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;With the exception of pharmacy, the Company expects wholesale price inflation to increase slightly in 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company's profitability is impacted by the cost of oil.&nbsp;&nbsp;Fluctuating fuel prices affect the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	delivered cost of product and the cost of other petroleum-based supplies.&nbsp;&nbsp;As a percentage of sales, the cost of diesel fuel used by the Company to deliver goods from its distribution center to its stores
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	decreased by 0.07% in 2015 compared to 2014 and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	decreased by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	0.02% in 2014 compared to 2013.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Although the Company experienced a decrease in these costs, the decline in expense was minimized due to higher fuel usage resulting from more store deliveries to meet the higher sales demand.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	According
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to the U.S. Department of Energy, the 52-week average diesel fuel price for the Central
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Atlantic States decreased $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	1.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	per gallon to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2.94
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	per gallon as of December 2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, compared to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4.00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	per gallon as of December 2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Diesel fuel prices for the Central Atlantic States peaked in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Februa
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	r
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	y
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2014 at $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4.36
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and steadily fell to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2.44
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	as of December 2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Based upon the U.S. Energy Information Administration&#x2019;s current projections, the Company is expecting diesel fuel prices to remain below $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2.50
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	during 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Although the Company experienced product cost inflation and deflation in various commodities in 2015, 2014 and 2013, management cannot accurately measure the full impact of inflation or deflation on retail pricing due to changes in the types of merchandise sold between periods, shifts in customer buying patterns and the fluctuation of competitive factors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	14
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	WEIS MARKETS, INC.
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 7PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Item 7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Management's Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations: (continued)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 7PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:12.7PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Results of Operations (continued)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 7PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Operating, General and Administrative Expenses
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Business operating costs including expenses generated from administration and purchasing functions, are recorded in "Operating, general and administrative expenses."&nbsp;&nbsp;Business operating costs include items such as wages, benefits, utilities, repairs and maintenance, advertising costs and credits, rent, insurance, depreciation, leasehold amortization and costs for outside provided services.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;The majority of the expenses were driven by increased sales.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company may not be able to recover rising expenses through increased prices charged to its customers.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	A majority of our associates are paid hourly rates related to federal and state
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	minimum wage laws.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company increased the base hourly rat
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	e for associates to $9 per hour
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	as of August 2, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in order to attract and retain talented associates with a goal of delivering best-in-class customer service.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company has decided not to increase prices to offset this hourly wage rate increase.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Employee-related costs such as wages, employer paid taxes, health care
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	benefits and retirement plans, comprise approximately 60% of the total &#x201C;Operating, general and administrative expenses.&#x201D;&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	As a percent of sales, direct store labor decreased 0.1% in 2015 compared to 2014 and decreased 0.2% in 2014 compared to 20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	13.&nbsp;&nbsp;The increase in the base hourly rate for associates to $9 per hour and related wage compression had an estimated cost of $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.2 million in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	second half o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	f 2015.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Increases
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in employee related expenses were offset by savings realized from a store labor efficiency project.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In addition, employee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	related expenses increased $7.3 million in 2015 compared to 2014 due to anticipated and actual achievement of incentives for various levels of management, which increased 0.2% as a percent of sales
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	While t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	he Company&#x2019;s self-insured health care benefit expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	only
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	increased by 0.4% in 2015 compared to 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	0.5% in 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	compared to 2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	he
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Company remains concerned about the impact that The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Patient Protection and Affordable
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Care Act
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(ACA)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	will
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	have on its future operating
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	expenses.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Based on the ACA definition of full time employment, t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	here will be approximately an 18% increas
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	e in full time employees
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, which is currently estimated to be a $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	928,000
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	increase in costs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	On September 21, 2013, the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	entered into a separation agreement with the former President and Chief Executive Officer.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company's "Operating, general and administrative expenses" were negatively impacted by the charge of $6.1 million worth of estimated expenses related to the separation agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;See Exhibit 10, filed with the quarterly report on Form 10-Q filed on November 7, 2013, for more information pertaining to the separation agreement.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Depreciation and amortization expense was $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	70.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	% of net sales, for 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	compared to $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	66.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million, or 2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	% of net sales, for 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	58.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	% of net sales, for 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;The increase in depreciation and amortization expense in 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	compared to 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and in 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	compared to 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	was the result of additional capital expenditures as the Company implements its capital expansion program.&nbsp;&nbsp;See the Liquidity and Capital Resources section for further information regarding the Company&#x2019;s capital expansion program.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company recognized pre-tax gains of $751,000, $2.6 million and $2.9 million in 2015, 2014 and 2013, respectively, from the sale of two properties in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	each year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In 2013, the Company determined that the asset value of four properties was impaired. As a result, the Company recognized a pre-tax impairment loss of $2.1 million.&nbsp;&nbsp;See Note 1(l) to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Consolidated Financial Statements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	included in this Annual Report on Form 10-K for more information on the Company's impairment charges.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Earnings were further impacted in 2013 by a $680,000 adjustment to liabilities for future expenses on closed stores.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Retail store profitability is sensitive to volatility in utility costs due to the amount of electricity and gas required to operate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the Company's stores and facilities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company is responding to this volatility in operating costs by employing conservation technologies, procurement strategies and associate energy awareness programs to manage and reduce consumption.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company continues to be a member of the EPA GreenChill program for advancing environmentally beneficial r
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	efrigerant management systems and has
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ten stores registered under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	this p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	rogram.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In addition, a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ll Company stores have an assigned Green Leader to promote in-store ene
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	rgy conservation.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#7030A0;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">

	Operating, General and Administrative Expense (continued)
</FONT>

	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD COLSPAN="9" VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:00.02%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;HEIGHT:12.75PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	A breakdown of the material increases (decreases) as a percent of sales in "Operating, general and administrative expenses" is as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" STYLE="WIDTH:55.28%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;HEIGHT:2.25PT;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;HEIGHT:2.25PT;OVERFLOW: HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Employee-related expenses increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	for the reasons noted above
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, primarily
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	related to increases in the basic hourly rate, management incentives and increases in sales volume. Hourly employees, particularly part time employees,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	are required to work increased hours when there is growth in sales volume.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Increases in employee related expenses were offset by savings realized from a store labor efficiency project
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in both 2015 and 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Store a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	dvertising expense decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	due to reduced spending on direct mail and weekly ads.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	n 2014,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	store
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	advertising expenses increased due to the promotion of the Company&#x2019;s new pricing strategy.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Depreciation and amortization increased in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2015 and 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	as a result of the Company&#x2019;s store capital expenditure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	program and technology investments.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Utility expense decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	for the reasons noted above related to energy conservation efforts and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	procurement strategies, along with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	reduced
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	electricity costs and usage and a reduction in the use of natural gas
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	T
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	he Company&#x2019;s utility expense increased in 2014 d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	espite
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the aforementioned initiatives primarily
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	due to higher
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	generation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	charges and below average
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	temperatures in the Mid-Atlantic States, the Company&#x2019;s operating region, in the first quarter of 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Rent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	xpense decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	primarily due to adjustments to accrued closed store liability estimates and purchasing a previously leased location.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Repairs/maintenance contracts increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	primarily due to new maintenance contracts for software and hardware including store front end systems.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Landlord common area maintenance expense
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	increased in 2014 due to higher than average snowfall in the Company&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	operating
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	region.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Item 7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Management's Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations: (continued)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:12.7PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:12.7PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Results of Operations (continued)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Investment Income
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company&#x2019;s investment portfolio consists of marketable securities, which currently includes municipal bonds and equity securities, as well as the Company&#x2019;s SERP investment, which is comprised of mutual funds that are maintained within the Company&#x2019;s non-qualified supplemental executive retirement plan and the non-qualified pharmacist deferred compensation plan.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company classifies all of its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	municipal bonds and equity securities as available-for-sale.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The SERP
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	nvestments are classified as trading securities.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 1PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Equity income decreased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in 2015 as a result of the Company receiving a stock dividend in 2014 which was not repeated in 2015. Equity income decreased in 2014 compared to 2013 due to recognizing gains on the sale of equity securities in 2013.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	SERP investment was impacted by market adjustments in both 2015 and 2014 and experienced a loss in 2015.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Provision for Income Taxes
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The effective income tax rate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	was 35.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	%, 35.0% and 38.2% in 2015, 2014 and 2013, respectively.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The effective income tax rate rose in 2015 due to an increase in state tax expense.&nbsp;&nbsp;The effect of this increase was partially offset by an increase in tax benefits related to tax exempt interest, food donations, and the Work Opportunity Tax Credit, resulting in a net increase of 0.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	7%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In 2014, pre-tax book income decreased significantly. Tax exempt interest and dividends eligible for a dividends received deduction increased, causing an increase to the net favorable permanent differences. The combination of the d
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	crease to net income before taxes and increase to the net favorable permanent differences resulted in a drop in the effective rate for 2014.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The effective income tax rate differs from the federal statutory rate of 35% primarily due to the effect of state taxes, net of permanent differences.
</FONT>
</P>

</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company&#x2019;s capital expansion program includes the construction of new superstores, the expansion and remodeling of existing units, the acquisition of sites for future expansion, new technology purchases and the continued upgrade of the Company&#x2019;s distribution fa
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	cilities and transportation fleet.&nbsp;&nbsp;Management current
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	plans
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	invest approximately $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	00
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	in its capital expansion program in 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT -0.75PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	WEIS MARKETS, INC.
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:15PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<A HREF="#WMK10K2015_10K_HTM_TABLE_OF_CONTENTS">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Table of Contents
</FONT>
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Item 7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Management's Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations: (continued)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Liquidity and Capital Resources
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	(continued)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Net cash used in financing activities was $32.3 million in 2015, 2014 and 2013, which solely consisted of dividend payments to shareholders.&nbsp;&nbsp;At December 26, 2015, the Company had a $30 million line of credit, of which $16.9 million was committed to outstanding letters of credit.&nbsp;&nbsp;The letters of credit are maintained primarily to support performance, payment, deposit or surety obligations of the Company.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company does not anticipate drawing on any of them.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company has a $50 million short-term credit facility agreement to fund future financing activities.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Total cash dividend payments on common stock, on a per share basis, amounted to $1.20 in 2015, 2014 and 2013.&nbsp;&nbsp;No treasury stock was purchased in 2015, 2014 or 2013.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Board of Directors&#x2019; 2004 resolution authorizing the repurchase of up to one million shares of the Company&#x2019;s common stock has a remaining balance of 752,468 shares.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company has no other commitment of capital resources as of December 26, 2015, other than the lease commitments on its store facilities and transportation equipment under operating leases that expire at various dates through 2029.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company anticipates funding its working capital requirements and its $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	100
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	million 2016 capital expansion program through cash and investment reserves and future internally generated cash flows from operations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The Company&#x2019;s earnings and cash flows are subject to fluctuations due to changes in interest rates as they relate to available-for-sale securities and any future long-term debt borrowings.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company&#x2019;s marketable securities portfolio currently consists of municipal bonds and equity securities.&nbsp;&nbsp;Other short-term investments are classified as cash equivalents on the Consolidated Balance Sheets.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Under its current policies, the Company invests in high-grade marketable debt securities and does not use interest rate derivative instruments to manage exposure to interest rate fluctuations.&nbsp;&nbsp;Currently, the Company&#x2019;s investment strategy of obtaining marketable debt securities with maturity dates between one and ten years helps to minimize market risk and to maintain a balance between risk and return.&nbsp;&nbsp;The equity securities owned by the Company consist primarily of stock held in large capitalized companies trading on public security exchange markets.&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company&#x2019;s management continually monitors the risk associated with its marketable securities.&nbsp;&nbsp;A quantitative tabular presentation of risk exposure is located in &#x201C;Item 7a. Quantitative and Qualitative Disclosures about Market Risk&#x201D; of this report
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	By their nature, these financial instruments inherently expose the holders to market risk.&nbsp;&nbsp;The extent of the Company&#x2019;s interest rate and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	other market risk is not quantifiable or predictable with precision due to the variability of future interest rates and other changes in market
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	conditions.&nbsp;&nbsp;However, the Company believes that its exposure in this area is not material.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

</FONT>

	,000 in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;

</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:9PT;">
	$
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:09.20%;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;HEIGHT:12.00PT;PADDING:0PT;">

	32,237
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Off-Balance Sheet Arrangements
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company is not a party to any off-balance sheet arrangements that have, or are reasonably likely to have, a current or future effect on the Company&#x2019;s financial condition, results of operations or cash flows, except for the Company's
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	lease commitments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to be recognized on the balance sheet
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	related to operating leases for its store facilit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ie
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	transportation equipment, which will be required
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	for annual periods beginning after
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	December 15, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	per the Financial Accounting Standards Board (&#x201C;FASB&#x201D;) Accounting Standards Update (&#x201C;ASU&#x201D;) 2016-02,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Leases (Topic 842)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	See Note
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	1(x)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Summary of Significant Accounting Policies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Consolidated Financial Statements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	included in this Annual Report on Form 10-K for m
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ore information on ASU 2016-02
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:15PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
