<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage69"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -27.35PT 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 16PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis Markets, Inc. Retirement Savings Plan
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	employees have been identified, subject to the further requirements of Section&nbsp;5.5(b)(1)(A)(viii) and Section&nbsp;5.5(c)(1)(A)(viii).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Top-Heavy Plan Years
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The top-heavy minimum benefit requirements shall be met as provided under Section&nbsp;3.2(c)(2) concerning profit sharing and qualified nonelective contribution allocations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(3)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Compensation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; For purposes of the allocation of the qualified nonelective contribution, compensation means compensation as defined in Section&nbsp;1.2(d) (subject to the limitations of Section&nbsp;1.2(c)) for the entire plan year, but limited to the employee's compensation for the portion of the plan year in which the employee actually is a member of the eligible class of employees as defined in Section&nbsp;2.2.&nbsp;&nbsp;However, for purposes of the top-heavy contribution, compensation means compensation as defined in Section&nbsp;5.1(c)(2), subject to the limitations of Section&nbsp;1.2(c).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841004">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 3.4 &#x2013; Employee 401(k) Elective Deferral Contributions
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Amount of Contribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; The employer shall contribute each plan year on behalf of each active participant who elects salary deferral a sum equal to the amount that the participant has elected to defer under a salary reduction arrangement or under a cash or deferred arrangement.&nbsp;&nbsp;The contribution shall be credited to the participant's employee 401(k) elective deferral account.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	A highly compensated employee may not elect a salary reduction in excess of any limitation established by board resolution.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such limitation shall be communicated to the highly compensated employees a reasonable time in advance of the date as of which it is effective.&nbsp;&nbsp;The plan administrator may limit the amount of salary reduction or deferred compensation at any time, if he determines that such limitation is necessary to meet the requirements for a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	"
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	qualified cash or deferred arrangement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	"
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	under Code section&nbsp;401(k) and regulations issued pursuant thereto as set forth in Section&nbsp;5.5.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Effective for plan years beginning prior to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, the plan administrator shall calculate the actual deferral percentage for the highly compensated employees using the testing method as provided under the prior statement of the plan document.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Effective for plan years beginning on or after January&nbsp;1,&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, the plan administrator shall calculate the actual deferral percentage for the highly compensated employees using the prior year testing method.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Salary Reduction Election
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Availability of Election
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; An active participant may effect a salary reduction agreement with the employer under which an employer contribution will be made to the plan on behalf of such participant only if he elects to reduce his compensation or to forgo an increase in his compensation.&nbsp;&nbsp;The amount of salary deferral may range from 0% to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	50
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	% of compensation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Election Procedures
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; A notice of a participant&#x2019;s salary reduction election shall be given to the employer and to the plan administrator in the manner established by the plan administrator.&nbsp;&nbsp;The plan administrator shall provide a written notice to all participants of the required procedures for making an election and the date as of which an election will be effective.&nbsp;&nbsp;An election shall be permitted at least once each plan year and the participants shall be permitted a reasonable time in which to make the election.&nbsp;&nbsp;However, in no event shall such election be made or be effective before the adoption of the employee 401(k) elective deferral contribution provision under the plan.&nbsp;&nbsp;A participant electing salary reduction will be deemed to desire to continue at the same rate, unless he notifies the plan administrator of his desire to change the amount of salary reduction.&nbsp;&nbsp;The revised election shall be effective in accordance with the plan administrator&#x2019;s published procedures.&nbsp;&nbsp;A salary reduction may be discontinued at any time upon proper notice in the manner established by the plan administrator.&nbsp;&nbsp;The plan administrator and employer shall treat a salary reduction election as having been revoked by the participant upon his termination of employment or his ceasing to be a member of the eligible class of participants.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	A participant who receives a distribution of elective deferrals on account of hardship shall be prohibited from making elective deferrals and employee nondeductible contributions under this and all other plans of the employer for 6&nbsp;months after receipt of the distribution.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(3)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Compensation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; For this purpose, compensation means compensation as defined in Section&nbsp;1.2(a) and&nbsp;(b) (subject to the limitations of Section&nbsp;1.2(c)), but excluding short term disability benefits not paid through the employer's payroll system, expense reimbursements, and any form of non-cash
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:236PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">

</FONT>

	W969
</FONT>

</P>
<A NAME="eolPage70"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -27.35PT 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 16PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis Markets, Inc. Retirement Savings Plan
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	compensation.&nbsp;&nbsp;The participant&#x2019;s salary reduction election shall apply only to compensation that becomes currently available to the employee after the effective date of the election.&nbsp;&nbsp;The employer shall apply the salary reduction election to all of the participant&#x2019;s compensation (and to increases in compensation), unless the participant&#x2019;s salary reduction election specifies that the election is to be limited to certain compensation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(4)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Catch-Up Contributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; All employees who are eligible to make elective deferrals under this plan before the close of the plan year and who have attained age&nbsp;50 or over by the end of their applicable taxable years shall be eligible to make catch-up contributions in accordance with, and subject to the limitations of, Section&nbsp;5.5(a)(2).&nbsp;&nbsp;The employer-imposed limitations on the maximum amount of permissible salary deferral shall not apply.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Cash or Deferred Election
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	No contribution shall be made under this plan pursuant to a cash or deferred election.&nbsp;&nbsp;All elective deferrals shall be made under a salary deferral election.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841005">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 3.4A &#x2013; Roth Elective Deferral Contributions
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Amount of Contribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; Effective
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	April&nbsp;1,&nbsp;2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	he employer shall contribute each plan year on behalf of each active participant who elects a Roth elective deferral under Code section&nbsp;402A a sum equal to the amount that the participant has elected to contribute as a Roth elective deferral pursuant to a salary reduction agreement.&nbsp;&nbsp;The contribution shall be credited to the participant's Roth elective deferral account.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Any limitations imposed under Section&nbsp;3.4(a) on the amount of salary reduction that a participant may elect shall be applied to the sum of the elections made under Section&nbsp;3.4 and this Section&nbsp;3.4A.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The plan administrator shall calculate the actual deferral percentage for the highly compensated employees as described in Section&nbsp;3.4(a), taking into account any participant contributions made to the Roth elective deferral account.&nbsp;&nbsp;Further, the Roth elective deferral account shall be included with the 401(k) elective deferral account for purposes of the actual deferral percentage and actual contribution percentage tests.&nbsp;&nbsp;Unless specifically stated otherwise, Roth elective deferrals shall be treated as elective deferrals for all purposes under the plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Salary Reduction Election
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Availability of Election
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; An active participant who is eligible to make 401(k) elective deferral contributions shall be eligible to designate all or a portion of his elective deferral contributions to be credited to his Roth elective deferral account.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such designation shall be irrevocable.&nbsp;&nbsp;The amount of Roth elective deferral together with any salary deferral made under Section&nbsp;3.4 may range as provided under Section&nbsp;3.4(b)(1).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Election Procedures
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; A notice of a participant's Roth deferral election shall be given to the employer and to the plan administrator in the manner as provided for 401(k) salary reduction elections under Section&nbsp;3.4(b)(2).&nbsp;&nbsp;The election may be made on the same form as the 401(k) salary reduction election but shall be a separate election.&nbsp;&nbsp;The plan administrator shall provide a written notice to all participants of the required procedures for making an election and the date as of which an election will be effective.&nbsp;&nbsp;An election shall be permitted at least once each plan year and the participants shall be permitted a reasonable time in which to make the election.&nbsp;&nbsp;However, in no event shall such election be made or be effective before the adoption of the Roth elective deferral contribution provision under the plan, except as provided in relief granted by the Commissioner of Internal Revenue.&nbsp;&nbsp;A participant electing Roth elective deferral account crediting for his salary reduction will be deemed to desire to continue at the same rate, unless he notifies the plan administrator of his desire to change such election.&nbsp;&nbsp;The revised election shall be effective in accordance with the plan administrator's published procedures.&nbsp;&nbsp;Roth elective deferral account crediting may be discontinued at any time upon proper notice in the manner established by the plan administrator.&nbsp;&nbsp;The plan administrator and employer shall treat a salary reduction election as having been revoked by the participant upon his termination of employment or his ceasing to be a member of the eligible class of participants.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	As provided in Section&nbsp;4.4, a participant who receives a hardship distribution shall be prohibited from making Roth elective deferrals under this and all other plans of the employer for 6&nbsp;months after receipt of the distribution.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>

<A NAME="eolPage71"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -27.35PT 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 16PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis Markets, Inc. Retirement Savings Plan
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(3)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Conditions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; The participant's election to have contributions credited to his Roth elective deferral account shall apply only to compensation that becomes currently available to the employee after the effective date of the election.&nbsp;&nbsp;The employer shall apply such election to the designated portion of the participant's compensation (and to increases in compensation), unless the participant's Roth deferral election specifies that the election is to be limited to certain compensation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(4)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Accounting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; Roth elective deferrals shall be credited only to the Roth elective deferral account.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such contributions shall not be transferred to the 401(k) elective deferral account.&nbsp;&nbsp;The plan administrator shall maintain an accounting of all participant contributions made thereto and withdrawals therefrom.&nbsp;&nbsp;Investment results and other credits or charges shall be separately allocated on a reasonable and consistent basis to the Roth elective deferral account and the other accounts under the plan.&nbsp;&nbsp;However, forfeitures may not be allocated to the Roth elective deferral account.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841006">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 3.5 &#x2013; Employee Nondeductible Contributions
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Employee nondeductible contributions are not permitted under this plan and no amount shall be credited to the employee nondeductible contribution account.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841007">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 3.6 &#x2013; Employer Matching Contributions
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 18PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Employer matching contributions shall be made under the provisions of this Section.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such contributions shall be credited to the employer matching contribution account or the qualified employer matching contribution account, as applicable.&nbsp;&nbsp;With respect to each interim allocation date, the employer shall contribute the amount necessary to fund the employer matching contribution allocation for the interim allocation period based on the eligible deferrals and participant compensation for such period.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 18PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Effective for plan years beginning prior to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, the plan administrator shall calculate the actual contribution percentage for the highly compensated employees using the testing method as provided under the prior statement of the plan document.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 18PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Effective for plan years beginning on or after January&nbsp;1,&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, the plan administrator shall calculate the actual contribution percentage for the highly compensated employees using the prior year testing method.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Qualified Matching Contributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; The employer matching contribution shall not be treated as a qualified matching contribution.&nbsp;&nbsp;A qualified matching contribution means matching contributions that are subject to the distribution and nonforfeitability requirements under Code section&nbsp;401(k) when made.&nbsp;&nbsp;A matching contribution must be a qualified matching contribution under Regulation section 1.401(k)-2(a)(6) in order to be taken into account under the ADP test.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Contributions Subject to Matching
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; Employer matching contributions shall be made for an eligible participant with respect to the following contributions:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">

</P>

<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;

	Any Roth elective deferral contributions made pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.4A

	Any catch-up contributions
</FONT>

</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Conditions for Allocation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2013; A participant shall be eligible for an allocation of an employer matching contribution as of an allocation date, provided that he satisfies the following conditions:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	He made a contribution that is subject to matching during the current plan year.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	AND
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	He completed at least one hour of service during the current allocation period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	AND
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Effective for allocations made after March 31, 2004, he is not a highly compensated employee who has held the title of chairman, vice chairman, president, or vice president with respect to the employer as of any day in the plan year on or before the allocation date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Notwithstanding the preceding requirements, any hours of service or employment requirement shall not apply in any plan year for which the employer elects to comply with the ACP safe harbor in years beginning after December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;1998.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:236PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	316
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	_
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	W969
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	:
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:187PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Copyright &#xA9; 20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	12
</FONT>

	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Conrad&nbsp;Siegel
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Actuaries
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	16
</FONT>

</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage72"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -27.35PT 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 16PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis Markets, Inc. Retirement Savings Plan
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT -6PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:6PT;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:8PT;PADDING:0PT 27PT 0PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Allocation Formula
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; The employer matching contribution and any applicable forfeitures shall be equal to the employer matching percentage applied to the participant&#x2019;s contributions for each allocation period within the current plan year that are subject to matching.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The employer matching percentage shall be determined each year by the employer in its own discretion.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Limitation on Total Matching Allocation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; Notwithstanding the preceding allocation formula(s), an allocation shall not be made to an individual participant's account to the extent that when combined with any other employer matching contribution made to the participant's account for the plan year, it would exceed the greatest of:&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;5% of his compensation; (ii) his elective deferrals for the plan year; or (iii)&nbsp;the product of 2 times the sum of the plan&#x2019;s representative matching rate (as defined in Section&nbsp;5.5(c)(1)(A)(viii)) plus the participant&#x2019;s elective deferrals for the plan year.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such an excess allocation shall be reallocated among the remaining eligible participants.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(3)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Compensation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; For purposes of the allocation of the employer matching contribution, compensation means compensation as defined in Section&nbsp;1.2(a) and&nbsp;(b) (subject to the limitations of Section&nbsp;1.2(c)) for the allocation period.&nbsp;&nbsp;Compensation includable under Section&nbsp;1.2(a) and&nbsp;(b) but not paid through payroll shall be treated as being paid as of the last day of the plan year or the last day of employment, if earlier.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Compensation shall exclude any bonus payable to the participant.&nbsp;&nbsp;Short term disability benefits not paid through the employer's payroll system, expense reimbursements, and any form of non-cash compensation shall not be taken into account for this purpose.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Forfeitures of Excess Aggregate Contributions
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Excess aggregate contributions that are determined under the actual contribution percentage test and that are attributed to employer matching contributions shall be distributed to the extent vested with a proportional amount of the nonvested employer matching contribution being forfeited as of the last day of the plan year in which the excess arose.&nbsp;&nbsp;Also, any forfeitures required for compliance with Code section&nbsp;401(a)(4) and Regulation section&nbsp;1.401(m)-2(b)(3)(v)(B) (because the contribution to which it relates is treated as an excess deferral, excess contribution, or excess aggregate contribution) shall occur as of such date.&nbsp;&nbsp;The forfeitures shall be treated in the manner described in Section&nbsp;4.2(c)(2) for the following plan year.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841008">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 3.7 &#x2013; Rollover/Transfer Contributions
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Rollover Contributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; An active participant may contribute to his rollover/transfer account any amounts that he previously received either as a lump sum distribution (as defined in Code section&nbsp;402(e)(4)(D)) or within one taxable year as a distribution from another qualified plan on account of termination of that plan provided that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	He transferred such distribution to an individual retirement account or annuity within sixty (60)&nbsp;days after receipt, or
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	He transferred such distribution to this plan within sixty (60)&nbsp;days after receipt.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Before accepting a rollover contribution, the trustee may require an employee to furnish satisfactory evidence that the proposed transfer is in fact a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	"
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	rollover contribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	"
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	that the Code permits an employee to make to a qualified plan.&nbsp;&nbsp;Effective for requests received on or after January&nbsp;1,&nbsp;2002, the acceptable sources for a rollover contribution shall be as set forth in Section&nbsp;3.7(b).&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the preceding or the provisions of Section&nbsp;3.7(b), this plan will not accept a rollover from a Roth elective deferral account.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Transfer Contributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; With the consent of the plan administrator, an active participant may have funds transferred directly to this plan from another qualified plan.&nbsp;&nbsp;Consent shall not be given if the optional forms of payment to which the funds are subject under the prior plan are not properly disclosed by the prior plan or cannot be accommodated by this plan and trust.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Further, this plan shall not accept any direct or indirect transfers from a defined benefit plan, money purchase plan (including a target benefit plan), stock bonus or profit sharing plan that would otherwise have provided for a life annuity form of payment to the participant.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:236PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 16PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis Markets, Inc. Retirement Savings Plan
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Effective for requests received on or after January&nbsp;1,&nbsp;2002, with the consent of the plan administrator, the participant may have the following transfers made on his behalf directly to this plan (or may make the following rollover contributions as permitted below):
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	A direct rollover of an eligible rollover distribution from a qualified plan described in Code section&nbsp;401(a) or 403(a), excluding after-tax employee contributions.
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Effective for plan years beginning on or after
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	April&nbsp;1,&nbsp;2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, a direct transfer from a Roth elective deferral account under a qualified Code section&nbsp;401(a) plan shall be permitted, provided the plan administrator is provided with appropriate accounting information to maintain the accounting records required under Section&nbsp;3.4A(b)(4).
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	A direct rollover of an eligible rollover distribution from an annuity contract described in Code section&nbsp;403(b), excluding after-tax employee contributions.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Effective on or after
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	April 1, 2016
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, a direct transfer from a Roth elective deferral account under a qualified Code section&nbsp;403(b) account shall be permitted, provided the plan administrator is provided with appropriate accounting information to maintain the accounting records required under Section&nbsp;3.4A(b)(4).
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	A direct rollover or a participant contribution of an eligible rollover distribution from an eligible plan under Code section&nbsp;457(b) that is maintained by a state, political subdivision of a state, or any agency or instrumentality of a state or political subdivision of a state.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	A participant rollover contribution of the portion of a distribution from an individual retirement account or annuity described in Code section&nbsp;408(a) or&nbsp;408(b) (including an account more specifically described under Code section&nbsp;408(k) or&nbsp;(p)) that is eligible to be rolled over and would otherwise be includable in gross income.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Contributions Before Plan Entry Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2013; An employee, (who is in the eligible class of employees) prior to satisfying the plan&#x2019;s eligibility conditions, may make a rollover or transfer contribution to the plan to the same extent and in the same manner as a participant.&nbsp;&nbsp;If an employee makes a rollover or transfer contribution to the plan before satisfying the plan's eligibility conditions, the plan administrator and trustee will treat the employee as a participant for all purposes of the plan, except the employee is not a participant for purposes of making or sharing in contributions or forfeitures under the plan until he actually becomes a participant in the plan.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the employee has a separation from service prior to becoming a participant, the trustee will distribute his rollover/transfer account to him.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Distribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2013; Withdrawals may be made from a rollover/transfer account under the terms and conditions set forth in Section&nbsp;4.4.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841009">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section 3.8 &#x2013; Allocation of Investment Results
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	General Allocation Procedures
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Investment income and market value appreciation or depreciation shall be allocated to each account of each participant who has accrued benefits in proportion to the respective account balances on each accounting date.&nbsp;&nbsp;For this purpose, each account balance shall be equal to the average balance for the period commencing on the day following the prior accounting date and ending on the current accounting date.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:1PT;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Investment Elections
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	A participant may elect to have all of his accounts invested in such investment fund or combination of investment funds as may be established by the trustee and made available for the benefit of participants; provided, however, that in no event may the participant direct that any portion of his account(s) be invested in collectibles (as defined in Code section&nbsp;408(m)).&nbsp;&nbsp;A participant's investment election shall not apply to any portion of any account that may be invested in a participant loan sub-account established under Section&nbsp;4.4.&nbsp;&nbsp;The investment results shall be allocated to the participant's account(s) based upon earnings and losses on the participant's share in such investment fund or funds.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The terms and conditions for investment direction shall be established by the plan administrator.&nbsp;&nbsp;An election may be revoked only by another election and will remain in effect until such revocation.&nbsp;&nbsp;If a participant fails to make any investment election prior to an allocation to his account(s), the trustee shall invest his account(s) in a qualified default investment alternative selected for the purpose that complies
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:236PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	316

	W969
