	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Conrad&nbsp;Siegel
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Actuaries
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	47
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage103"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -27.35PT 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 16PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis Markets, Inc. Retirement Savings Plan
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	year multiplied by a fraction, the numerator of which is such participant's excess aggregate contributions for the year and the denominator is the participant's account balance(s) attributable to contribution percentage amounts without regard to any income or loss occurring during such plan year.&nbsp;&nbsp;Effective solely for the plan year beginning on or after January&nbsp;1,&nbsp;2006 and the plan year beginning on or after January&nbsp;1,&nbsp;2007, and to the extent the excess contributions were credited with gain or loss as of an accounting date within the gap period (i.e., the period after the close of the plan year and prior to the distribution), allocable income or loss also includes 10% of the amount determined under the preceding sentence multiplied by the number of whole calendar months between the end of the plan year and the date of distribution, counting the month of distribution if distribution occured after the 15th of such month.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(B)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Forfeitures of Excess Aggregate Contributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; Forfeitures of excess aggregate matching contributions may either be reallocated to the accounts of nonhighly compensated employees or applied to reduce employer contributions, as provided in Section&nbsp;3.6(e).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(C)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Accounting for Excess Aggregate Contributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; Excess aggregate contributions allocated to a participant shall be forfeited, if forfeitable or distributed on a pro-rata basis from the participant's employee nondeductible contribution account and employer matching contribution account (and, if applicable, the participant's qualified nonelective contribution account or elective deferral account(s), or both).&nbsp;&nbsp;For plan years beginning after December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;2005, distribution of elective deferrals that are excess aggregate contributions shall be made first from the participant's Roth elective deferral account, to the extent Roth elective deferrals were made for the year.&nbsp;&nbsp;Excess aggregate elective deferrals shall only be distributed from the 401(k) elective deferral account after the Roth elective deferrals made for the year have been fully distributed.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(D)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Excess Aggregate Contributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	shall mean, with respect to any plan year, the excess of:&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;The aggregate contribution percentage amounts taken into account in computing the numerator of the contribution percentage actually made on behalf of highly compensated employees for such plan year, over (ii)&nbsp;The maximum contribution percentage amounts permitted by the ACP test (determined by hypothetically reducing contributions made on behalf of highly compensated employees in order of their contribution percentages beginning with the highest of such percentages).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Such determination shall be made after first determining excess elective deferrals pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.5(a) and then determining excess contributions pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.5(b)(2).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(3)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Required Forfeitures
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; Any employer matching contribution attributable to an excess elective deferral determined pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.5(a) or an excess contribution determined pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.5(b)(2) shall be forfeited.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any nonvested excess aggregate contribution determined pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.5(c)(2) shall also be forfeited.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Top-Heavy Requirements
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Elective deferrals (and for plan years beginning before January&nbsp;1,&nbsp;2002 employer matching contributions) will not be taken into account for the purpose of satisfying the minimum top-heavy contribution requirement.&nbsp;&nbsp;However, qualified nonelective contributions and employer matching contributions (for plan years beginning on or after January&nbsp;1,&nbsp;2002) may be taken into account for this purpose as provided in Section&nbsp;3.2(c) or&nbsp;3.3(b), as appropriate.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Restrictions on Payment of Certain Accounts
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Elective deferrals, qualified nonelective contributions, and qualified matching contributions, and income allocable to each are not distributable to a participant or his beneficiary in accordance with such person's election, earlier than upon the participant's severance from employment, death, or disability.&nbsp;&nbsp;All distributions that may be made pursuant to one or more of the distributable events described in this Section&nbsp;5.5(e) are subject to the spousal and participant consent requirements as described in Section&nbsp;5.2(a).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Such account balances may also be distributed upon:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Termination of the plan without the employer maintaining or establishing another defined contribution plan (other than an employee stock ownership plan (as defined in Code section&nbsp;4975(e)(7) or&nbsp;409(a)), a simplified employee pension plan (as defined in Code section&nbsp;408(k)), a SIMPLE IRA plan (as defined in Code section&nbsp;408(p)), a plan or contract
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:236PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	316
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage104"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -27.35PT 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 16PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis Markets, Inc. Retirement Savings Plan
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	described in Code section&nbsp;403(b) or a plan described in Code section&nbsp;457(b) or&nbsp;(f)) at any time during the period beginning on the date of plan termination and ending 12&nbsp;months after all assets have been distributed from the plan.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such a distribution must be made in a lump sum or through the purchase of an annuity contract that shall be owned by the participant (if an annuity payment option is otherwise available under Section&nbsp;4.3(b)).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The attainment of age&nbsp;59&#xBD; in the case of a profit sharing plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(3)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The hardship of the participant as described in Section&nbsp;4.4(a).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(f)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Safe Harbor Alternative Compliance
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	If the plan so provides in Section&nbsp;3.4(a) or Section&nbsp;3.6 that the safe harbor requirements will be met, the provisions of this Section&nbsp;5.5(f) shall apply for the plan year as provided in such Sections and any provisions relating to the ADP test described in Section&nbsp;5.5(b) or the ACP test described in Section&nbsp;5.5(c) shall not apply.&nbsp;&nbsp;To the extent that any other provision of the plan is inconsistent with the provisions of this Section&nbsp;5.5(f), the provisions of this Section&nbsp;5.5(f) shall govern when Section&nbsp;3.4(a) or Section&nbsp;3.6 so provide.&nbsp;&nbsp;In accordance with Regulation sections&nbsp;1.401(k)-1(e)(7) and 1.401(m)-1(c)(2), it is impermissible for the employer to use ADP and ACP testing for a plan year in which it is intended for the plan through its written terms to be a Code section&nbsp;401(k) safe harbor plan and a Code section&nbsp;401(m) safe harbor plan and the employer fails to satisfy the requirements of such safe harbors for the plan year.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ADP Test Safe Harbor Contributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; The plan may provide in Section&nbsp;3.4(a) that the ADP test safe harbor requirements shall be satisfied by the employer making a safe harbor employer matching contribution as provided under Section&nbsp;3.6 (or as a separate safe harbor employer matching contribution as provided under Section&nbsp;3.6A) or by the employer making a safe harbor nonelective contribution of at least 3% of the employee's compensation under Section&nbsp;3.3 or another defined contribution plan sponsored by the employer.&nbsp;&nbsp;In any case, the notice described in Section&nbsp;5.5(f)(4) shall be given.&nbsp;&nbsp;The participant's accrued benefit derived from ADP test safe harbor contributions shall be nonforfeitable and may not be distributed earlier than provided in Section&nbsp;5.5(e), regardless of the form of the contribution.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	If the plan provides in Section&nbsp;3.4(a) that the safe harbor nonelective contribution will be made in satisfaction of the qualified automatic contribution arrangement requirements, the contribution shall be held under the safe harbor qualified automatic contribution arrangement sub-account.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such account shall not become 100% vested until the participant has completed 2&nbsp;years of vesting service.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any forfeiture therefrom shall be used to reduce the employer&#x2019;s safe harbor contribution.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(3)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ACP Test Safe Harbor Requirements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; The plan may provide in Section&nbsp;3.6 that the ACP test safe harbor requirements shall be satisfied by the employer making a safe harbor nonelective contribution under Section&nbsp;3.3 of at least 3% of the employee's compensation or by the employer making a matching contribution on behalf of each eligible employee that either:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(A)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	is equal to 100% of the elective contributions of the employee to the extent such elective contributions do not exceed 3% of the employee's compensation, plus 50% of the elective contributions of the employee to the extent that such elective contributions exceed 3% but do not exceed 5% of the employee's compensation; or
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(B)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	does not increase as an employee's rate of elective contributions increase and the aggregate amount of which is at least equal to the aggregate amount of matching contributions which would be made if matching contributions were made on the basis of the percentages described in Section&nbsp;5.5(f)(3)(A).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	If the plan provides in Section&nbsp;3.4(a) and Section&nbsp;3.6(b)(2) that the safe harbor matching contribution will be made in satisfaction of the qualified automatic contribution arrangement requirements, in place of the matching contribution formula described in Section&nbsp;5.5(f)(3)(A), the employer shall contribute an amount equal to 100% of the elective contributions of the employee to the extent such elective contributions do not exceed 1% of the employee's compensation, plus 50% of the elective contributions of the employee to the extent that such elective contributions exceed 1% but do not exceed 6% of the employee's compensation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In any case, the notice described in Section&nbsp;5.5(f)(4) shall be given and matching contributions on behalf of any employee shall not be made with respect to an employee's nondeductible contributions
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:236PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	316
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	_
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	W969
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	:
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:187PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Copyright &#xA9; 20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	12
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Conrad&nbsp;Siegel
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Actuaries
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	49
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage105"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -27.35PT 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 16PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis Markets, Inc. Retirement Savings Plan
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or elective deferrals in excess of 6% of the employee's compensation.&nbsp;&nbsp;The rate of an employer's matching contribution shall not increase as the rate of an employee's nondeductible contributions or elective deferrals increase nor shall the matching contribution with respect to any highly compensated employee be greater than that with respect to a nonhighly compensated employee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(4)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Safe Harbor Notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; If the employer elects to satisfy the safe harbor requirements of this Section&nbsp;5.5(f) or if the employer wishes to take advantage of the 3.5&nbsp;month extension for the return of excess contributions and excess aggregate contributions, the plan administrator shall provide to each employee eligible to participate in the plan, no less than 30&nbsp;days and no more than 90&nbsp;days prior to any plan year (or his entry date in the case of a new participant), written notice of the employee's rights and obligations under the plan that is sufficiently accurate and comprehensive to apprise the employee of such rights and obligations.&nbsp;&nbsp;If an employee becomes eligible to participate after the 90th day before the beginning of the plan year and does not receive the notice for that reason, the notice must be provided no more than 90&nbsp;days before the employee becomes eligible but not later than the date the employee becomes eligible.&nbsp;&nbsp;This timing requirement shall be deemed satisfied in the case of a plan that provides for participation upon date of employment if the notice is provided as soon as practicable after that date but prior to the pay date for the first payroll period.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Notwithstanding the preceding, where the plan is not intended to comply with either the ADP or ACP safe harbor requirements, but only the eligible automatic contribution arrangement requirements of Code section&nbsp;414(w); the notice shall contain only the items listed in Section&nbsp;5.5(f)(4)(A)(viii) through&nbsp;(xi).&nbsp;&nbsp;If the employer wishes to take advantage of the 3.5&nbsp;month extension for the return of excess contributions and excess aggregate contributions, then the notice shall be provided to all employees eligible to be covered by the plan.&nbsp;&nbsp;Otherwise, after the initial notice is provided to all eligible employees who have not chosen to make 401(k) deferral contributions, no notice will be provided to employees who have made an affirmative election to defer or not to defer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(A)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Contents of the Notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; Such notice shall be written in a manner calculated to be understood by the average employee eligible to participate hereunder.&nbsp;&nbsp;The notice shall accurately describe:&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;the safe harbor matching or nonelective contribution formula used under the plan (including a description of the levels of matching contributions, if any, available under the plan); (ii)&nbsp;any other contributions under the plan (including the potential for discretionary matching contributions) and the conditions under which such contributions are made; (iii)&nbsp;the plan to which safe harbor contributions will be made if such contributions will be made to another plan; (iv)&nbsp;the type and amount of compensation that may be deferred under the plan; (v)&nbsp;how to make cash or deferred elections, including any administrative requirements that apply to such elections; (vi)&nbsp;the periods available under the plan for making cash or deferred elections; (vii)&nbsp;withdrawal and vesting provisions applicable to contributions under the plan; (viii)&nbsp;the level of elective contributions that will be made on an employee&#x2019;s behalf if he does not make an affirmative election; (ix)&nbsp;the employee's right under any automatic salary reduction contribution arrangement to elect not to have elective contributions made on the employee's behalf (or to elect to have such contributions made at a different percentage); (x)&nbsp;if the employee is eligible to make investment elections under Section&nbsp;3.8, how contributions made under the arrangement will be invested in the absence of any investment election by the employee; and (xi)&nbsp;the employee's right to make a permissible withdrawal, if applicable, and the procedures to elect such a withdrawal.&nbsp;&nbsp;If eligible employees have been provided with the current summary plan description, the written notice may instead cross-reference the relevant portion with respect to items&nbsp;(ii), (iii), and&nbsp;(iv); however, such notice must also provide the telephone numbers, addresses and, if applicable, electronic addresses, of the individuals or offices from whom employees can obtain additional information about the plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(B)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Alternative Timing of Amendment and Notice for Safe Harbor Nonelective Contribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; If an employer using the current year method to satisfy the ADP test determines that it may choose during a plan year to satisfy the ADP test safe harbor requirements by providing a safe harbor nonelective contribution, the plan administrator shall provide a written notice to eligible employees before the beginning of the plan year that (i)&nbsp;the plan may be amended during the plan year to provide that the employer will make a safe harbor nonelective contribution of at least 3% to the plan for the plan year and (ii)&nbsp;if the plan is so amended, a supplemental notice will be given to eligible employees 30&nbsp;days prior to the last day of the plan year informing them of such an amendment.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the employer elects during the plan year to satisfy the ADP test safe harbor requirements by providing a safe harbor nonelective contribution, the amendment shall be adopted not later than 30&nbsp;days before the last day of the plan year.&nbsp;&nbsp;The supplemental notice
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:236PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	316
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	_
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	W969
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	:
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:187PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Copyright &#xA9; 20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	12
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Conrad&nbsp;Siegel
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Actuaries
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT">

	50

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage106"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -27.35PT 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 16PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis Markets, Inc. Retirement Savings Plan
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	shall be distributed no later than 30&nbsp;days prior to the last day of the plan year and shall state that a 3% safe harbor nonelective contribution will be made for the plan year.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 14PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841022">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ARTICLE VI &#x2013; ADMINISTRATION OF THE PLAN
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841023">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 6.1 &#x2013; Fiduciary Responsibility
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Fiduciary Standards
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; A fiduciary shall discharge his duties with respect to a plan solely in the interest of the participants and beneficiaries and &#x2013;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	For the exclusive purpose of providing benefits to participants and their beneficiaries and defraying reasonable expenses of administering the plan;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	With the care, skill, prudence, and diligence under the circumstances then prevailing that a prudent man acting in a like capacity and familiar with such matters would use in the conduct of an enterprise of a like character and with like aims;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	By diversifying the investments of the plan so as to minimize the risk of large losses, unless under the circumstances it is clearly prudent not to do so; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In accordance with the documents and instruments governing the plan insofar as such documents and instruments are consistent with the provisions of ERISA.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Allocation of Fiduciary Responsibility
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	It is intended to allocate to each fiduciary, either named or otherwise, the individual responsibility for the prudent execution of the functions assigned to him.&nbsp;&nbsp;None of the allocated responsibilities or any other responsibilities shall be shared by two or more fiduciaries unless specifically provided for in the plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	When one fiduciary is required to follow the directions of another fiduciary, the two fiduciaries shall not be deemed to share such responsibility.&nbsp;&nbsp;Instead, the responsibility of the fiduciary giving the directions shall be deemed to be his sole responsibility and the responsibility of the fiduciary receiving directions shall be to follow those directions insofar as such instructions on their face are proper under applicable law.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(3)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Any person or group of persons may serve in more than one fiduciary capacity with respect to this plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(4)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	A fiduciary under this plan may employ one or more persons, including independent accountants, attorneys and actuaries to render advice with regard to any responsibility such fiduciary has under the plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Indemnification by Employer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; Unless resulting from the gross negligence, willful misconduct or lack of good faith on the part of a fiduciary who is an officer or employee of the employer, the employer shall indemnify and save harmless such fiduciary from, against, for and in respect of any and all damages, losses, obligations, liabilities, liens, deficiencies, costs and expenses, including without limitation, reasonable attorney's fees and other costs and expenses incident to any suit, action, investigation, claim or proceedings suffered in connection with his acting as a fiduciary under the plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Named Fiduciary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The person or persons named by the employer as having fiduciary responsibility for the management and control of plan assets shall be known as the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	"
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	named fiduciary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	"
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	hereunder.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such responsibility shall include the appointment of the plan administrator (Section&nbsp;6.2(a)) and the investment manager (Section&nbsp;6.4(b)) and the deciding of benefit appeals (Section&nbsp;6.3).&nbsp;&nbsp;The employer shall retain the authority to appoint the trustee (Section&nbsp;6.4(a)).&nbsp;&nbsp;The named fiduciary possesses exclusive authority to monitor the plan&#x2019;s receipt of contributions and enforce the collection of delinquent contributions to the trust.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841024">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 6.2 &#x2013; Plan Administrator
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Appointment of Plan Administrator
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The named fiduciary shall appoint a plan administrator who may be a person or an administrative committee consisting of no more than five members.&nbsp;&nbsp;Vacancies occurring upon resignation or removal of
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:236PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	316
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	_
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	W969
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	:
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:187PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Copyright &#xA9; 20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	12
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Conrad&nbsp;Siegel
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Actuaries
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	51
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage107"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -27.35PT 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 16PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis Markets, Inc. Retirement Savings Plan
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a plan administrator or a committee member shall be filled promptly by the named fiduciary.&nbsp;&nbsp;Any plan administrator may resign at any time by giving notice of his resignation to the named fiduciary, and any plan administrator may be removed at any time by the named fiduciary.&nbsp;&nbsp;The named fiduciary shall review at regular intervals the performance of the plan administrator(s) and shall re-evaluate the appointment of such administrator(s).&nbsp;&nbsp;After the named fiduciary has appointed the plan administrator and has received a written notice of acceptance, the fiduciary responsibility for administration of the plan shall be the responsibility of the plan administrator or plan administrative committee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Duties and Powers of Plan Administrator
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The plan administrator shall have the following duties and discretionary powers and such other duties and discretionary powers as relate to the administration of the plan:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	To determine in a nondiscriminatory manner all questions relating to the eligibility of employees to become participants.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	To determine in a nondiscriminatory manner eligibility for benefits and to determine and certify the amount and kind of benefits payable to participants.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(3)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	To authorize all disbursements from the fund.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(4)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	To appoint or employ any independent person to perform necessary plan functions and to assist in the fulfillment of administrative responsibilities as he deems advisable, including the retention of a third party administrator, custodian, auditor, accountant, actuary, or attorney.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(5)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	When appropriate, to select an insurance company and annuity contracts that, in his opinion, will best carry out the purposes of the plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(6)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	To construe and interpret any ambiguities in the plan and to make, publish, interpret, alter, amend or revoke rules for the regulation of the plan that are consistent with the terms of the plan and with ERISA.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(7)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	To prepare and distribute, in such manner as determined to be appropriate, information explaining the plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Allocation of Fiduciary Responsibility Within Plan Administrative Committee
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	If the plan administrator is a plan administrative committee, the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	committee shall choose from its members a chairperson and a secretary.&nbsp;&nbsp;The committee may allocate responsibility for those duties and powers listed in Section&nbsp;6.2(b)(1) and&nbsp;(2) (except determination of qualification for disability retirement) and other purely ministerial duties to one or more members of the committee.&nbsp;&nbsp;The committee shall review at regular intervals the performance of any committee member to whom fiduciary responsibility has been allocated and shall re-evaluate such allocation of responsibility.&nbsp;&nbsp;After the plan administrative committee has made such allocations of responsibilities and has received written notice of acceptance, the fiduciary responsibilities for such administrative duties and powers shall then be considered as the responsibilities of such committee member(s).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Miscellaneous Provisions
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Plan Administrative Committee Actions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; The actions of such committee shall be determined by the vote or other affirmative expression of a majority of its members.&nbsp;&nbsp;Either the chairperson or the secretary may execute any certificate or other written direction on behalf of the committee.&nbsp;&nbsp;A member of the committee who is a participant shall not vote on any question relating specifically to himself.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the remaining members of the committee, by majority vote thereof, are unable to come to a determination of any such question, the named fiduciary shall appoint a substitute member who shall act as a member of the committee for the special vote.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Expenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; The plan administrator shall serve without compensation for service as such.&nbsp;&nbsp;All reasonable expenses of the plan administrator shall be paid by the employer or from the fund.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(3)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Examination of Records
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; The plan administrator shall make available to any participant for examination during business hours such of the plan records as pertain only to the participant involved.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:236PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	316

	W969

	:
</FONT>

	52

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage108"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -27.35PT 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 16PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis Markets, Inc. Retirement Savings Plan
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(4)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Information to the Plan Administrator
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; To enable the plan administrator to perform the administrative functions, the employer shall supply full and timely information to the plan administrator on all participants as the plan administrator may require.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841025">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 6.3 &#x2013; Claims Procedure
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Notification of Claim Determination
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; The plan administrator shall notify each participant in writing of his determination of benefits.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the plan administrator denies any benefit, such written denial shall include:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The specific reasons for denial;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Reference to provisions on which the denial is based;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	A description of and reason for any additional information needed to process the claim; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	A description of the plan&#x2019;s review procedures and the time limits applicable to such procedures, including a statement of the claimant&#x2019;s right to bring a civil action under ERISA section&nbsp;502(a) following an adverse benefit determination on review.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If a claim is wholly or partially denied, the plan administrator shall notify the claimant of the plan's adverse benefit determination within a reasonable period of time, but not later than 90&nbsp;days after receipt of the claim by the plan, unless the plan administrator determines that special circumstances require an extension of time for processing the claim.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the plan administrator determines that an extension of time for processing is required, written notice of the extension shall be furnished to the claimant prior to the termination of the initial 90
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#8209;day period.&nbsp;&nbsp;In no event shall such extension exceed a period of 90&nbsp;days from the end of such initial period.&nbsp;&nbsp;The extension notice shall indicate the special circumstances requiring an extension of time and the date by which the plan expects to render the benefit determination.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Appeal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2013; The participant or his duly authorized representative may:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Make a written request for a review of the participant's case by the named fiduciary;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Review upon request and free of charge, have reasonable access to, and have copies of, all documents, records, and other information relevant to the claimant's claim for benefits;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Submit written issues, comments, documents, records, and other information relating to the claim for benefits, without regard to whether such information was submitted or considered in the initial benefit determination.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The written request for review must be submitted no later than 60&nbsp;days after receiving written notification of denial of benefits.&nbsp;&nbsp;A document, record, or other information shall be considered relevant to a claimant's claim if such document, record, or other information:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Was relied upon in making the benefit determination;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Was submitted, considered, or generated in the course of making the benefit determination, without regard to whether such document, record, or other information was relied upon in making the benefit determination; or
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:72PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Demonstrates compliance with the administrative processes and safeguards required by law in making the benefit determination.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Appeal Procedure
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Except as provided in Section&nbsp;6.3(c)(2), the named fiduciary must render a decision no later than 60&nbsp;days after receiving the written request for review, unless circumstances make it impossible to do so; but in no event shall the decision be rendered later than 120&nbsp;days after the request for review is received.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the named fiduciary determines that an extension of time for processing is required, written notice of the extension shall be furnished to the claimant by the plan administrator prior to the termination of the initial 60-day period.&nbsp;&nbsp;The extension notice shall indicate the special circumstances requiring an extension of time and the date by which the plan expects to render the determination on review.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If the named fiduciary is a committee or board of trustees that holds regularly scheduled meetings at least quarterly, Section&nbsp;6.3(c)(1) shall not apply.&nbsp;&nbsp;The named fiduciary shall instead make a benefit determination no later than the date of the meeting of the committee or board that immediately follows
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:236PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	316
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	_
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	W969
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	:
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:187PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER">

	by
