<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage109"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -27.35PT 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 16PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis Markets, Inc. Retirement Savings Plan
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the plan's receipt of a request for review, unless the request for review is filed within 30&nbsp;days preceding the date of such meeting.&nbsp;&nbsp;In such case, a benefit determination may be made by no later than the date of the second meeting following the plan's receipt of the request for review.&nbsp;&nbsp;If special circumstances require a further extension of time for processing, a benefit determination shall be rendered not later than the third meeting of the committee or board following the plan's receipt of the request for review.&nbsp;&nbsp;If such an extension of time for review is required because of special circumstances, the plan administrator shall provide the claimant with written notice of the extension, describing the special circumstances and the date as of which the benefit determination will be made, prior to the commencement of the extension.&nbsp;&nbsp;The plan administrator shall notify the claimant of the benefit determination as soon as possible, but not later than 5&nbsp;days after the benefit determination is made.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(3)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The review shall take into account all comments, documents, records, and other information submitted by the claimant relating to the claim, without regard to whether such information was submitted or considered in the initial benefit determination.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the claim is denied upon review, the written notice of denial shall include the items listed in Section&nbsp;6.3(a) and the statement required by Regulation section&nbsp;2560.503
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#8209;1(j)(5)(iii) regarding the possible availability of alternative dispute resolution options.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Limitation on Time Period for Litigation of a Benefit Claim
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; Following receipt of the written rendering of the named fiduciary's decision under Section&nbsp;6.3(c), the participant shall have 365&nbsp;days in which to file suit in the appropriate court.&nbsp;&nbsp;Thereafter, the right to contest the decision shall be waived.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841026">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 6.4 &#x2013; Trust Fund
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Appointment of Trustee
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	employer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	shall appoint a trustee for the proper care and custody of all funds, securities and other properties in the trust, and for investment of plan assets (or for execution of such orders as it receives from an investment manager appointed for investment of plan assets).&nbsp;&nbsp;The duties and powers of the trustee shall be set forth in a trust agreement executed by the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	employer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, which is incorporated herein by reference.&nbsp;&nbsp;The
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	named fiduciary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	shall review at regular intervals the performance of the trustee and shall re-evaluate the appointment of such trustee.&nbsp;&nbsp;After the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	employer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	has appointed the trustee and the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	named fiduciary
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	has received a written notice of acceptance of its responsibility, the fiduciary responsibility with respect to the proper care and custody of plan assets shall be considered as the responsibility of the trustee.&nbsp;&nbsp;Unless otherwise allocated to an investment manager, the fiduciary responsibility with respect to investment of plan assets shall likewise be considered as the responsibility of the trustee.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Appointment of Investment Manager
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The named fiduciary may appoint an investment manager who is other than the trustee, which investment manager may be a bank or an investment advisor registered with the Securities and Exchange Commission under the Investment Advisors Act of 1940.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such investment manager, if appointed, shall have sole discretion in the investment of plan assets, subject to the funding policy.&nbsp;&nbsp;The named fiduciary shall review at regular intervals no less frequently than annually, the performance of such investment manager and shall re-evaluate the appointment of such investment manager.&nbsp;&nbsp;After the named fiduciary has appointed an investment manager and has received a written notice of acceptance of its responsibility, the fiduciary responsibility with respect to investment of plan assets shall be considered as the responsibility of the investment manager.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Funding Policy
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The named fiduciary shall determine and communicate in writing to the fiduciary responsible for investment of plan assets the funding policy for the plan.&nbsp;&nbsp;The funding policy shall set forth the plan's short-range and long-range financial needs, so that said fiduciary may coordinate the investment of plan assets with the plan's financial needs.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Valuation of the Fund
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The fund shall be valued by the trustee on the last day of each plan year and as of any interim allocation date determined by the plan administrator.&nbsp;&nbsp;The valuation shall be made on the basis of the current fair market value of all property in the fund.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:236PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	316
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	_
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	W969
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	:
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:187PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER">

	Copyright &#xA9; 20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	12

	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Conrad&nbsp;Siegel
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Actuaries
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	54
</FONT>

</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage110"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -27.35PT 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 16PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis Markets, Inc. Retirement Savings Plan
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Expenses
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The trust fund may pay the expenses incurred in the administration of the plan and the investment of the fund, provided the cost is reasonable.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such expenses shall include legal fees incurred by the plan administrator or the trustee, provided such fiduciaries are not proven to have committed a prohibited transaction.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the trust fund pays the expenses, the expenses shall be allocated against the participant accounts on a pro rata basis, unless otherwise specifically provided in the summary plan description.&nbsp;&nbsp;Certain expenses incurred with respect to a particular participant or beneficiary may be allocated against the participant's account on a direct basis.&nbsp;&nbsp;The plan administrator shall communicate such expense charges to the participant through a written notice.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 14PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841027">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ARTICLE VII &#x2013; AMENDMENT AND TERMINATION OF PLAN
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841028">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 7.1 &#x2013; Right to Discontinue and Amend
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	It is the expectation of the employer that it will continue this plan indefinitely and make the payments of its contributions hereunder, but the continuance of the plan is not assumed as a contractual obligation of the employer and the right is reserved by the employer, at any time, to reduce, suspend or discontinue its contributions hereunder.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841029">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 7.2 &#x2013; Amendments
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 18PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Except as herein limited, the employer shall have the right to amend this plan at any time to any extent that it may deem advisable.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such amendment shall be stated in writing.&nbsp;&nbsp;It shall be authorized by action of the board of directors under the corporate by-laws if the employer is a corporation, by action of the agreement of the partners as required under the partnership agreement if the employer is a partnership, or by action of the sole proprietor if the employer is a sole proprietorship.&nbsp;&nbsp;The authorization of an employer's board of directors shall designate the person to execute the amendment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 18PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The employer's right to amend the plan shall be limited as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	No amendment shall increase the duties or liabilities of the plan administrator, the trustee, or other fiduciary without their respective written consent.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	No amendments shall have the effect of vesting in the employer any interest in or control over any contracts issued pursuant hereto or any other property in the fund.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	No amendment to the plan shall be effective to the extent that it has the effect of decreasing a participant's accrued benefit.&nbsp;&nbsp;This includes a plan amendment that decreases a participant&#x2019;s accrued benefit, or otherwise places greater restrictions or conditions on a participant&#x2019;s rights to Code section&nbsp;411(d)(6) protected benefits, even if the amendment merely adds a restriction or condition that is permitted under the vesting rules in Code section&nbsp;411(a)(3) through (11).&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the preceding sentence, a participant's account balance may be reduced to the extent permitted under Code section&nbsp;412(d)(2) or to the extent permitted under Regulation sections&nbsp;1.411(d)-3 and 1.411(d)-4.&nbsp;&nbsp;For purposes of this paragraph, a plan amendment that has the effect of decreasing a participant's account balance, with respect to benefits attributable to service before the amendment shall be treated as reducing an accrued benefit.&nbsp;&nbsp;Furthermore, if the vesting schedule of a plan is amended, in the case of an employee who is a participant as of the later of the date such amendment is adopted or the date it becomes effective, the nonforfeitable percentage (determined as of such date) of such employee's right to his employer-derived accrued benefit will not be less than his percentage computed under the plan without regard to such amendment.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	No amendment to the plan shall be effective to eliminate or restrict an optional form of benefit.&nbsp;&nbsp;The preceding sentence shall not apply to a plan amendment that eliminates or restricts the ability of a participant to receive payment of his or her account balance under a particular optional form of benefit if the amendment provides a single-sum distribution form that is otherwise identical to the optional form of benefit being eliminated or restricted.&nbsp;&nbsp;For this purpose, a single-sum distribution form is otherwise identical only if the single-sum distribution form is identical in all respects to the eliminated or restricted optional form of benefit (or would be identical except that it provides greater rights to the participant) except with respect to the timing of payments after commencement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:236PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	316
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	_
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	W969
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	:
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:187PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Copyright &#xA9; 20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	12
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Conrad&nbsp;Siegel
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Actuaries

<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT">

	55

<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage111"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -27.35PT 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 16PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis Markets, Inc. Retirement Savings Plan
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	No amendment to the vesting schedule adopted by the employer hereunder shall deprive a participant of his vested portion of his employer contribution accounts to the date of such amendment.&nbsp;&nbsp;If the plan's vesting schedule is amended, or the plan is amended in any way that directly or indirectly affects the computation of the participant's nonforfeitable percentage or if the plan is deemed amended by an automatic change to or from a top-heavy vesting schedule, each participant with at least 3&nbsp;years of service with the employer may elect, within a reasonable period after the adoption of the amendment or change, to have the nonforfeitable percentage computed under the plan without regard to such amendment or change.&nbsp;&nbsp;For participants who do not have at least one hour of service in any plan year beginning after December&nbsp;31,&nbsp;1988, "5&nbsp;years of service" shall be substituted for "3&nbsp;years of service" in the preceding sentence.&nbsp;&nbsp;The period during which the election may be made shall commence with the date the amendment is adopted or deemed to be made and shall end on the latest of:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	60&nbsp;days after the amendment is adopted;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(2)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	60&nbsp;days after the amendment becomes effective; or
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 54PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(3)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	60&nbsp;days after the participant is issued written notice of the amendment by the employer or plan administrator.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841030">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 7.3 &#x2013; Protection of Benefits in Case of Plan Merger
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 18PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In the event of a merger or consolidation with, or transfer of assets or liabilities to any other plan, each participant will receive a benefit immediately after such merger, consolidation or transfer (if the plan then terminated) that is at least equal to the benefit the participant was entitled to immediately before such merger, consolidation or transfer (if the plan had terminated).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 18PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Effective
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	October
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	1,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2008
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, the transfer of amounts from this trust to a nonqualified foreign trust shall be treated as a distribution from this plan.&nbsp;&nbsp;Further, the transfer of assets and liabilities from this plan to a plan that satisfies Puerto Rico Code section&nbsp;1165 shall also be treated as a distribution from this plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841031">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 7.4 &#x2013; Termination of Plan
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	When Plan Terminates
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; This plan shall terminate upon the happening of any of the following events:&nbsp;&nbsp;legal adjudication of the employer as bankrupt; a general assignment by the employer to or for the benefit of its creditors; the legal dissolution of the employer; or termination of the plan by the employer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Allocation of Assets
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2013; Upon termination, partial termination, or complete discontinuance of employer contributions, the account balance(s) of each affected participant who is an active participant or who is not an active participant but has neither received a complete distribution of his vested accrued benefit nor incurred five one-year breaks in service (as defined in Section&nbsp;4.1) shall be 100% vested and nonforfeitable.&nbsp;&nbsp;The amount of the fund assets shall be allocated to each participant, subject to provisions for expenses of administration of the liquidation, in the ratio that such participant's account(s) bears to all accounts.&nbsp;&nbsp;If a participant under this plan has terminated his employment at any time after the first day of the plan year in which the employer made his final contribution to the plan, and if any portion of any account of such terminated participant was forfeited and reallocated to the remaining participants, such forfeiture shall be reversed and the forfeited amount shall be credited to the account of such terminated participant.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 14PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841032">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ARTICLE VIII &#x2013; MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841033">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 8.1 &#x2013; Exclusive Benefit &#x2013; Non-Reversion
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 18PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The plan is created for the exclusive benefit of the employees of the employer and shall be interpreted in a manner consistent with its being a qualified plan as defined in section&nbsp;401(a) of the Internal Revenue Code and with ERISA.&nbsp;&nbsp;The corpus or income of the trust may not be diverted to or used for other than the exclusive benefit of the participants or their beneficiaries (except for defraying reasonable expenses of administering the plan).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 18PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Notwithstanding the above, a contribution paid by the employer to the trust may be repaid to the employer under the following circumstances:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:236PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	316
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	_
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	W969
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:6PT;">
	:
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:187PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Copyright &#xA9; 20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

	by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Conrad&nbsp;Siegel
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Actuaries
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage112"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT -27.35PT 9PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL NARROW;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-SIZE: 9PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 16PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis Markets, Inc. Retirement Savings Plan
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Any contribution made by the employer because of a mistake of fact must be returned to the employer within one year of the contribution.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In the event the deduction of a contribution made by the employer is disallowed under Code section&nbsp;404, such contribution (to the extent disallowed) must be returned to the employer within one year of the disallowance of the deduction.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	If the Commissioner of Internal Revenue determines that the plan is not initially qualified under the Internal Revenue Code, any contribution made incident to that initial qualification by the employer must be returned to the employer within one year after the date the initial qualification is denied, but only if the application for the qualification is made by the time prescribed by law for filing the employer's return for the taxable year in which the plan is adopted, or such later date as the Secretary of the Treasury may prescribe.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841034">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 8.2 &#x2013; Inalienability of Benefits
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 18PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	No benefit or interest available hereunder including any annuity contract distributed herefrom shall be subject to assignment or alienation, either voluntarily or involuntarily.&nbsp;&nbsp;The preceding sentence shall also apply to the creation, assignment, or recognition of a right to any benefit payable with respect to a participant pursuant to a domestic relations order, unless such order is determined to be a qualified domestic relations order as defined in Code section&nbsp;414(p), or any domestic relations order entered before January&nbsp;1,&nbsp;1985.&nbsp;&nbsp;A loan made to a participant and secured by his nonforfeitable account balance(s) under Section&nbsp;4.4(b) will not be treated as an assignment or alienation and such securing account balance(s) shall be subject to attachment by the plan in the event of default.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 18PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Notwithstanding the preceding paragraph, effective with respect to judgments, orders, and decrees issued, and settlement agreements entered into, on or after August&nbsp;5,&nbsp;1997, a participant&#x2019;s benefit (and that of his spouse) shall be reduced to satisfy liabilities of the participant to the plan due to (1)&nbsp;the participant being convicted of committing a crime involving the plan, (2)&nbsp;a civil judgment (or consent order or decree) entered by a court in an action brought in connection with a violation of the fiduciary provisions of part&nbsp;4 of subtitle&nbsp;B of Title&nbsp;I of ERISA, or (3)&nbsp;a settlement agreement between the Secretary of Labor or the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation and the participant in connection with a violation of such fiduciary provisions of ERISA.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;No reduction shall be made pursuant to this paragraph, unless the judgment, order, decree, or settlement agreement shall expressly provide for the offset of all or part of the amount ordered or required to be paid to the Plan against the participant&#x2019;s benefits provided under the Plan.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841035">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 8.3 &#x2013; Employer-Employee Relationship
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	This plan is not to be construed as creating or changing any contract of employment between the employer and its employees, and the employer retains the right to deal with its employees in the same manner as though this plan had not been created.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841036">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 8.4 &#x2013; Binding Agreement
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	This plan shall be binding on the heirs, executors, administrators, successors and assigns as such terms may be applicable to any or all parties hereto, and on any participants, present or future.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841037">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 8.5 &#x2013; Separability
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	If any provision of this plan shall be held invalid or unenforceable, such invalidity or unenforceability shall not affect any other provision hereof and this plan shall be construed and enforced as if such provision had not been included.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841038">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 8.6 &#x2013; Construction
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The plan shall be construed in accordance with the laws of the state in which the employer was incorporated (or is domiciled in the case of an unincorporated employer) and with ERISA.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841039">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 8.7 &#x2013; Copies of Plan
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	This plan may be executed in any number of counterparts, each of which shall be deemed as an original, and said counterparts shall constitute but one and the same instrument that may be sufficiently evidenced by any one counterpart.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
</P>
<P>

</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis Markets, Inc. Retirement Savings Plan
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:3PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Section 8.8 &#x2013; Interpretation
</FONT>
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX10-A_HTM__TOC434841040">
</A>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 18PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Wherever appropriate, words used in this plan in the singular may include the plural or the plural may be read as singular, and the masculine may include the feminine.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 18PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:146.5PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 9PT;TEXT-INDENT: -9PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS 2;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 9PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	The Internal Revenue Service has issued an advisory letter with respect to the volume submitter specimen plan (VS) sponsored by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	Conrad&nbsp;Siegel
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	Actuaries
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	from which this plan was created.&nbsp;&nbsp;T
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	his letter constitutes a determination as to the qualification of the plan as adopted by a particular employer only under the circumstances, and to the extent, described herein.&nbsp;&nbsp;An employer adopting a VS plan may rely on that plan's advisory letter if the employer's plan is identical to an approved specimen plan with a currently valid favorable advisory letter, the employer has not amended the plan other than to choose options provided under the approved plan or to adopt compliance amendments provided by the sponsor, and the employer has followed the terms of the plan.&nbsp;&nbsp;Such an employer can forego filing Form&nbsp;5307 and can rely on the plan's favorable advisory letter with respect to the qualification requirements, except with respect to the plan&#x2019;s satisfaction of the nondiscrimination requirements where a safe harbor provision has not been adopted.&nbsp;&nbsp;The advisory letter does not constitute a ruling or determination as to the exempt status of the related trust.
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:54PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:54PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 14PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	COMPLIANCE AMENDMENT
</FONT>
<BR />
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	TO THE
</FONT>
<BR />
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis Markets, Inc. Retirement Savings Plan
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	As authorized by Section&nbsp;7.2 of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis Markets, Inc. Retirement Savings Plan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	("Plan") as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	amended and restated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	effective
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	January&nbsp;1,&nbsp;2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, the employer,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Weis Markets, Inc.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	hereby amends the Plan to comply with certain law and regulatory changes effective as of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	plan year not otherwise incorporated into the Plan.&nbsp;&nbsp;This amendment shall supersede the provisions of the Plan to the extent those provisions are inconsistent with the provisions of this amendment.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The employer hereby amends the Plan in the following manner:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:0PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;TEXT-TRANSFORM:UPPERCASE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;;;PADDING:0PT 3PT 0PT 0PT;">
	First:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Spouse
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Effective as of June 26, 2013, i
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	n response to the overturning of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Defense of Marriage Act, 110 Stat. 2419, section&nbsp;3 by the Supreme Court in United States
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	v
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. Windsor,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section&nbsp;1.7(c) is amended to redefine "spouse" for purposes of the Plan and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	reference the marriage certificate as evidence of marriage.&nbsp;&nbsp;As amended, Section 1.7(c) shall read as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Spouse
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	means the person married to the participant at the time of the determination as evidenced by a marriage certificate valid under the marriage licensing laws of the place of issuance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:0PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;TEXT-TRANSFORM:UPPERCASE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;;;PADDING:0PT 3PT 0PT 0PT;">
	Second:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Rollover/Transfer Contributions
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	3.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	is amended to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	eliminate references to conduit individual retirement accounts and simplify the evidence requirements for the source plan.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	As amended, Section
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.7(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall read as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT:-18PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Rollover Contributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2013; A participant may contribute to his rollover/transfer account any amounts that he previously received as a lump sum distribution (as defined in Code section&nbsp;402(e)(4)(D)) provided that he transfers such distribution to this plan within sixty (60)&nbsp;days after receipt.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Before accepting a rollover contribution, the trustee may require an employee to furnish satisfactory evidence that the proposed transfer is in fact a "rollover contribution" that the Code permits an employee to make to a qualified plan.&nbsp;&nbsp;If and to the extent the transferring plan is represented to be a retirement plan qualified under 401(a) that is not sponsored by a church or governmental agency, the employee shall not be required to furnish such evidence, except with respect to Roth or other after-tax accounting.&nbsp;&nbsp;Further, no evidence shall be required when the check is issued by a financial institution indicating that the distribution is from an individual retirement account, 403(b) account, or a governmental entity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;457(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	account previously maintained for the benefit of the employee.&nbsp;&nbsp;The acceptable sources for a rollover contribution shall be as set forth in Section&nbsp;3.7(b).&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding the preceding or the provisions of Section&nbsp;3.7(b), this plan will not accept a rollover from a Roth elective deferral account or a Code section&nbsp;408A Roth individual retirement account.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	As amended, Section
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	contain an additional provision that shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	read as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	I
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	f the plan administrator later determines that the contribution was an invalid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	transfer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	contribution, the plan administrator
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	distribute the amount of the invalid contribution, plus any earnings attributable thereto, to the employee within a reasonable time after such determination.
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:0PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;TEXT-TRANSFORM:UPPERCASE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;;;PADDING:0PT 3PT 0PT 0PT;">
	Third:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Payment Election Procedures
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.3(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	is amended to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	permit a terminating participant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	elect
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	multiple destinations for his direct rollover distributions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	so that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	he may designate the allocation of the pretax amounts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;As amended, Section
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.3(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	contain an additional paragraph that shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	read as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 36PT;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If and to the extent the participant elects multiple destinations for his direct rollover distributions, he may designate the allocation of the pretax amounts.
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 100%;TEXT-INDENT:0PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE: 11PT;MARGIN:6PT 0PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;TEXT-TRANSFORM:UPPERCASE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PUNCTUATION-WRAP:HANGING;VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE;FONT-FAMILY:ARIAL;FONT-SIZE:11PT;;;PADDING:0PT 3PT 0PT 0PT;">
	Fourth:
</FONT>

	Effective Date
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<TD VALIGN="MIDDLE" STYLE="WIDTH:32.16%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;HEIGHT:12.75PT;PADDING:0PT;">

<EFX_EXHIBIT_31>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_31"></A>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage118"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT -0.75PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	WEIS MARKETS, INC.
</FONT>
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Exhibit 31.1
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT -0.75PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX31-1_HTM_TOC_EXHIBIT31_1_CERTIFICATIONCEO">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	CERTIFICATION- CEO
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I, Jonathan H. Weis, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.&nbsp;&nbsp;I have reviewed this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	nnual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	R
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	eport on Form 10-K of Weis Markets, Inc.;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.&nbsp;&nbsp;Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the periods covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.&nbsp;&nbsp;Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT -0.75PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a)&nbsp;&nbsp;designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	b)&nbsp;&nbsp;designed such internal controls over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	c)&nbsp;&nbsp;evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#x2019;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	d)&nbsp;&nbsp;disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the registrant&#x2019;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant's fourth fi
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	scal quarter in the case of an A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	nnual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	R
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	eport) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT -0.75PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT -0.75PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	over financial reporting, to the registrant&#x2019;s auditors and the audit committee of registrant&#x2019;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a)&nbsp;&nbsp;all significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal controls over financial
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#x2019;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	b)&nbsp;&nbsp;any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_2"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX31-2_HTM_TOC_EXHIBIT31_2_CERTIFICATIONCFO">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	CERTIFICATION- CFO
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I, Scott F. Frost, certify that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	1.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I have reviewed this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	nnual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	R
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	eport on Form 10-K of Weis Markets, Inc.;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.&nbsp;&nbsp;Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the periods covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT -0.75PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	3.&nbsp;&nbsp;Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT -0.75PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a)&nbsp;&nbsp;designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	b)&nbsp;&nbsp;designed such internal controls over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	c)&nbsp;&nbsp;evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#x2019;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	d)&nbsp;&nbsp;disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the registrant&#x2019;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant's fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	nnual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	R
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	eport) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT -0.75PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	over financial reporting, to the registrant&#x2019;s auditors and the audit committee of registrant&#x2019;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a)&nbsp;&nbsp;all significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal controls over financial
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#x2019;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 13.5PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	b)&nbsp;&nbsp;any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 0PT 27PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<A NAME="WMK10K2015EX32_HTM_TOC_EXHIBIT32_CERTIFICATIONPURSUANTO">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO
</FONT>
<BR />
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	18 U.S.C. SECTION 1350,
</FONT>
<BR />
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO
</FONT>
<BR />
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SECTION 906 OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In connection with the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	nnual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	R
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	eport of Weis Markets, Inc. (the "Company") on Form 10-K for th
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	e fiscal year ending December 2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, as filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on the date hereof (the "Report"), we, Jonathan H. Weis,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Chairman, President and Chief Executive Officer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, and Scott F. Frost, Senior Vice President,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Chief Financial Officer and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Treasurer, of the Company, certify, pursuant to and for purposes of 18 U.S.C. Section 1350, as adopted pursuant to Section 906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(1) to my knowledge the Report fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a) or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(2) the information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:NORMAL;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
